title: Public welfare, national progress among govtâ€™s priorities: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 08 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday said that public welfare and national progress were among the priorities of the federal government and Pakistan Muslim League-N.
The prime minister was talking to former members of the Punjab provincial Assembly, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
Former MPAs including Rana Mashhood, Aneeza Fatima, Rahila Khadim Hussain and Rumesh Singh separately called on the prime minister.During meetings, the overall national and provincial political situation was discussed.
